member.name: T:MiInput.Action
member.summary: A collection of inputs mapped to a name.

member.name: M:MiInput.Action.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor.

member.name: M:MiInput.Action.#ctor(MiInput.Action)
member.summary: Copy constructor.

member.name: M:MiInput.Action.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructs the object with the given positive name.

member.name: M:MiInput.Action.#ctor(System.String,MiInput.InputMap[])
member.summary: Constructs the object with the given positive name and input map.

member.name: P:MiInput.Action.Name
member.summary: Action name.

member.name: P:MiInput.Action.Empty
member.summary: If no inputs are mapped.

member.name: P:MiInput.Action.Count
member.summary: The amount of mapped inputs.

member.name: P:MiInput.Action.Item(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Accesses the input map at the given index.
member.returns: The input map at the given index.

member.name: M:MiInput.Action.Contains(MiInput.InputMap)
member.summary: If the action already contains the input map.
member.returns: True if the action already contains the input map.

member.name: M:MiInput.Action.Get(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Gets the input map at the given index.
member.returns: The input map at the given index or null if the index is out of range.

member.name: M:MiInput.Action.Set(System.UInt32,MiInput.InputMap)
member.summary: Replaces an existing input map.
member.returns: True if index is within range, map is valid and does not collide with any existing input maps, and the existing input map was replaces with map, otherwise false.

member.name: M:MiInput.Action.Add(MiInput.InputMap)
member.summary: Adds an input map.
member.returns: True if the input map is valid, does not collide with any existing input maps, and was added successfully.

member.name: M:MiInput.Action.Add(MiInput.InputMap[])
member.summary: Adds several input maps and returns how many were successful.
member.returns: The amount of successfully added input maps.

member.name: M:MiInput.Action.Remove(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Removes the input map at the given index.
member.returns: If the index is valid and the input map was removed successfully.

member.name: M:MiInput.Action.Remove(MiInput.InputMap)
member.summary: Removes the given input map.
member.returns: If the input map existed and was removed successfully.

member.name: M:MiInput.Action.Clear
member.summary: Removes as input maps.

member.name: P:MiInput.Action.Value
member.summary: Returns the current value of the mapped input.

member.name: P:MiInput.Action.IsPositive
member.summary: If the mapped inputs are classed as positive/pressed.

member.name: P:MiInput.Action.IsNegative
member.summary: If the mapped inputs are classed as negative/pressed.

member.name: P:MiInput.Action.IsPressed
member.summary: If any of the mapped inputs are pressed.

member.name: P:MiInput.Action.JustPressed
member.summary: If any of the mapped inputs were just pressed.

member.name: P:MiInput.Action.JustReleased
member.summary: If any of the mapped inputs were just released.

member.name: P:MiInput.Action.IsValid
member.summary: If the action is valid.

member.name: M:MiInput.Action.LoadFromXml(System.Xml.XmlElement)
member.summary: Loads data from an xml element.
member.param: The element to load data from.
member.returns: True if loaded successfully and false otherwise.

member.name: M:MiInput.Action.ToString
member.summary: Returns the action as an xml string, ready to be written to file.
member.returns: The action as an xml string.

member.name: M:MiInput.Action.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the collection.
member.returns: An enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection.

member.name: T:MiInput.ActionSet
member.summary: A collection of actions.

member.name: M:MiInput.ActionSet.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor.

member.name: M:MiInput.ActionSet.#ctor(MiInput.ActionSet)
member.summary: Copy constructor.

member.name: M:MiInput.ActionSet.#ctor(MiInput.Action[])
member.summary: Constructs the set, populating it with one or multiple actions.
member.param: The actions to construct the set with.

member.name: P:MiInput.ActionSet.Item(System.String)
member.summary: Accesses the action with the given name if it exists within the set.
member.returns: The action with the given name in the set if it exists, otherwise null.

member.name: P:MiInput.ActionSet.Empty
member.summary: If the set contains no actions.

member.name: P:MiInput.ActionSet.Count
member.summary: The amount of actions in the set.

member.name: M:MiInput.ActionSet.Contains(MiInput.Action)
member.summary: If the set contains either the given action, or an action with the same name.
member.returns: True if the set contains the action and false otherwise.

member.name: M:MiInput.ActionSet.Contains(System.String)
member.summary: If the set contains an action with the given name.
member.returns: True if the set contains an action with the given name and false otherwise.

member.name: M:MiInput.ActionSet.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the action with the given name if it exists within the set.
member.returns: The action with the given name in the set if it exists, otherwise null.

member.name: M:MiInput.ActionSet.Add(MiInput.Action,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds an action to the set.
member.param: If an action with the same name exists in the set, should it be replaced?
member.returns: True if the action was successfully added to the set and false otherwise.

member.name: M:MiInput.ActionSet.Add(MiInput.Action[])
member.summary: Adds multipe actions to the set.
member.param: One or multiple actions to add.
member.returns: The amount of actions that were successfully added to the set.

member.name: M:MiInput.ActionSet.Remove(MiInput.Action)
member.summary: Removes either the given action, or an existing action with the same name from the set.
member.returns: True if the action existed within the set and was removed successfully and false otherwise.

member.name: M:MiInput.ActionSet.Remove(System.String)
member.summary: Removes either the given action, or an existing action with the same name from the set.
member.returns: True if the action existed within the set and was removed successfully and false otherwise.

member.name: M:MiInput.ActionSet.Clear
member.summary: Removes all actions from the set.

member.name: M:MiInput.ActionSet.LoadFromFile(System.String)
member.summary: Loads the set from an xml file.
member.param: The path of the file to load.
member.returns: True on success and false on failure.

member.name: M:MiInput.ActionSet.LoadFromXml(System.Xml.XmlElement)
member.summary: Attempts to load the object from the xml element.
member.returns: True if object data was loaded successfully and false otherwise.

member.name: M:MiInput.ActionSet.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string containg the xml data of the set as it would be written in file.
member.returns: A string containg the xml data of the set as it would be written in file.

member.name: M:MiInput.ActionSet.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the collection.
member.returns: An enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection.

member.name: T:MiInput.Input
member.summary: Singleton input manager class.

member.name: F:MiInput.Input.MaxJoysticks
member.summary: Maximum number of joysticks that can be connected at once.

member.name: F:MiInput.Input.AxisPressThreshold
member.summary: Minimum axis value that registers a button press.

member.name: F:MiInput.Input.DefaultPath
member.summary: Default input settings path.

member.name: M:MiInput.Input.IsButton(MiInput.InputDevice,System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the given string represents a valid buttton/key for the given input device.
member.returns: True if the given string represents a valid button/key for the given input device, otherwise false.

member.name: M:MiInput.Input.IsAxis(MiInput.InputDevice,System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the given string represents a valid axis for the given input device.
member.returns: True if the given string represents a valid axis for the given input device, otherwise false.

member.name: P:MiInput.Input.Manager
member.summary: The singleton input manager instance.

member.name: P:MiInput.Input.Keyboard
member.summary: Keyboard manager.

member.name: P:MiInput.Input.Mouse
member.summary: Mouse manager.

member.name: P:MiInput.Input.Joystick
member.summary: Array of joystick managers for each player.

member.name: P:MiInput.Input.FirstJoystick
member.summary: The index of the first connected joystick.

member.name: P:MiInput.Input.Actions
member.summary: Currently mapped actions for each player.

member.name: P:MiInput.Input.LastDevice
member.summary: The device the most recent input came from. Assigned when calling .

member.name: M:MiInput.Input.JoystickConnected(System.UInt32)
member.summary: If the joystick at the given index is connected.
member.param: The player index of the joystick.
member.returns: True if the joystick is connected and false otherwise.

member.name: M:MiInput.Input.IsPressed(MiInput.InputDevice,System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the given button/key is pressed on the given device.
member.returns: True if the button/key is valid for the given device and is pressed, otherwise false.

member.name: M:MiInput.Input.JustPressed(MiInput.InputDevice,System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the given button/key has just been pressed on the given device.
member.returns: True if the button/key is valid for the given device and has just been pressed, otherwise false.

member.name: M:MiInput.Input.JustReleased(MiInput.InputDevice,System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the given button/key has just been released on the given device.
member.returns: True if the button/key is valid for the given device and has just been released, otherwise false.

member.name: M:MiInput.Input.GetAxis(MiInput.InputDevice,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the current value of the given axis on the given device.
member.returns: The current value of the given axis on the given device if it is valid, otherwise 0.0f.

member.name: M:MiInput.Input.GetLastAxis(MiInput.InputDevice,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the previous value of the given axis on the given device.
member.returns: The previous value of the given axis on the given device if it is valid, otherwise 0.0f.

member.name: M:MiInput.Input.GetAxisDelta(MiInput.InputDevice,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the delta value of the given axis on the given device.
member.returns: The delta value of the given axis on the given device if it is valid, otherwise 0.0f.

member.name: M:MiInput.Input.AxisIsPressed(MiInput.InputDevice,System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the given axis is pressed on the given device.
member.returns: True if the axis is valid for the given device and is pressed, otherwise false.

member.name: M:MiInput.Input.AxisJustPressed(MiInput.InputDevice,System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the given axis has just been pressed on the given device.
member.returns: True if the axis is valid for the given device and has just been pressed, otherwise false.

member.name: M:MiInput.Input.AxisJustReleased(MiInput.InputDevice,System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the given axis has just been released on the given device.
member.returns: True if the axis is valid for the given device and has just been released, otherwise false.

member.name: M:MiInput.Input.IsPressed(System.String,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Checks if the input mapped to action is pressed.
member.param: The name of the mapped action.
member.returns: True if index and action are valid, mapped and pressed, otherwise false.
member.exception: If player greater than or equal to .

member.name: M:MiInput.Input.JustPressed(System.String,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Checks if the input mapped to action was just pressed.
member.param: The name of the mapped action.
member.returns: True if index and action are valid, mapped and was just pressed, otherwise false.
member.exception: If player greater than or equal to .

member.name: M:MiInput.Input.JustReleased(System.String,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Checks if the input mapped to action was just released.
member.param: The name of the mapped action.
member.returns: True if index and action are valid, mapped and was just released, otherwise false.
member.exception: If player greater than or equal to .

member.name: M:MiInput.Input.GetValue(System.String,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Gets the current value of the action.
member.param: The name of the mapped action.
member.returns: The current value of the mapped action if it is valid, otherwise zero.
member.exception: If player greater than or equal to .

member.name: M:MiInput.Input.Update
member.summary: Updates input device states.

member.name: M:MiInput.Input.LoadFromXml(System.Xml.XmlElement)
member.summary: Attempts to load the object from the xml element.
member.returns: True if the object was loaded successfully and false otherwise.

member.name: M:MiInput.Input.LoadFromFile(System.String)
member.summary: Loads the action set from an optional path.
member.param: The path to load the action set from, or null to use the default path.
member.returns: True on success and false on failure.

member.name: M:MiInput.Input.SaveToFile(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Saves the action set to an optional path, optionally overwriting any existing file.
member.param: If an already existing file should be overwritten.
member.returns: True if the action set was successfully written to file, otherwise false.

member.name: M:MiInput.Input.ToString
member.summary: Converts the object to an xml string.
member.returns: Returns the object as an xml string.

member.name: T:MiInput.JoystickManager
member.summary: Manages the state of the Joysticks.

member.name: M:MiInput.JoystickManager.IsButton(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the given string represents a valid button.
member.remarks: A valid button string is a number between zero and the button count.
member.returns: True if the given string represents a valid joystick button and false otherwise.

member.name: M:MiInput.JoystickManager.ToButton(System.String)
member.summary: Parses the given string to its joystick button representation.
member.returns: The joystick button parsed from the string on success or -1 on failure.

member.name: M:MiInput.JoystickManager.IsAxis(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the given string represents a valid axis.
member.returns: True if the given string represents a valid joystick axis and false otherwise.

member.name: M:MiInput.JoystickManager.ToAxis(System.String)
member.summary: Parses the given string to its joystick axis value.
member.returns: The joystick axis value parsed from the string on success or -1 on failure.

member.summary: Constructor.

member.summary: Copy constructor.

member.returns: True if the button name is valid and the button is pressed, otherwise false.

member.summary: If the button is pressed.
member.returns: True if the button index is valid and the button is pressed, otherwise false.

member.summary: If the button has just been pressed.

member.summary: If the button has just been released.
member.returns: True if the button name is valid and the button has just been released, otherwise false.

member.name: M:MiInput.JoystickManager.JustReleased(MiInput.XButton)
member.summary: If the button has just been released.
member.returns: True if the button index is valid and the button has just been released, otherwise false.

member.summary: Checks if any button is currently pressed.
member.returns: True if any buttons are currently pressed and false otherwise.

member.returns: The difference in value between the last to update calls of the given axis from the given joystick player index. Will also return zero if is out of range.
